alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 3:54AM EDT until March 19 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Wet snow and freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations around a light glaze, up to three tenths at higher elevations. A dusting to an inch of snow and sleet possible. * WHERE...In New Hampshire, Northern Coos County. In Maine, Central Somerset, Northern Franklin and Northern Oxford Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to icy roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wet snow early morning will transition to a period of sleet and freezing rain by late morning or midday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
